description: Number of labeled triangular cacti with 2n+1 nodes (n triangles).
links: Index entries for sequences related to cacti
formula: a(n) = A034940(n)/(2n+1).The closed form a(n) = (2n-1)!! (2n+1)^(n-1) can be obtained from the generating function in A034940. - _Noam D. Elkies_, Dec 16 2002
author: _Christian G. Bower_, Oct 15 1998
